text:
@GregAbbott_TX Ps Want folks 2 get back out more, work & shop? 

TESTING + mandatory measures like masks 2 help give MINIMUM safety measure! 

I WILL NOT RISK being amongst other ppl who STILL believe #COVID19 2B fake! 

I WILL NOT put my clients & employees in harms way! 

DO SOMETHING 4 TX! https://t.co/pstm8b43SR
